channel.title: Pi simple coords help (box)

item.title: Pi simple coords help (box)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

You only need the north-west and south-east coordinates for a box.

^
Just go from corner to corner and get the X/Y values.
Change the first absX to the lowest X value, the second to the highest.
Same with absY.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi simple coords help (box)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Change “absX > 5555” to “absX > 2509”
Change “absX < 5555” to “absX < 2546”
Change “absY > 5555” to “absY > 4761”
Change “absY < 5555” to “absY < 4793”

Read full topic

item.title: Pi simple coords help (box)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

public boolean inLALALALALl() {
if (absX > 5555 && absX < 5555 && absY > 5555 && absY < 5555){
return true;
}
return false;
}

how can i make a box hotspot (pvp) with these coords
X 2509 Y 4764
X 2509 Y 4793
X 2546 Y 4793
X 2546 Y 4761
